summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Executive Department - Office of Management and Budget; increasing the expenditure allowance for Object of Expenditure "3000 - Other Services and Charges" Program Category "Management and Budget" (Code 1200) in the 1975 Budget of said Department to provide for continued assistance of expert consultants in connection with the City's Solid Waste/Methanol/Ammonia Project; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
